Aws secret required ???:: WORK IN PROGESS

APPNAME_USERNAME_PASSWD => a client API password SECRET_KEY => the secret key

Aws Env required:

AWS_REGION_NAME => default="eu-east-1"
AWS_APPNAME_SECRET_NAME =>The name of the secret bucket
